info.title: Moscow once again turned a strong snowfall. Video
Moscow updated the daily record of the height of the graves
Raccova reported a five-fold increase in spine operations
On the purple branch of the Moscow subway, a man fell on the way.

Synoptic reported record farms in Moscow
